channel.title: Kyle Chadha's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Kyle Chadha's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there, I’m the founder of Self Taught Coder, where I share the specific knowledge I’ve learned while improving my skills as a software engineer without a formal CS background. I’m a software engineer at Honey (acquired by PayPal) where I work on the core backend team responsible for the architecture and development of Honey’s data platform. Feedback is always welcome. Thanks!

item.title: First Post
item.description: One day, there might be something here!

item.title: Learning How to Learn
item.description: Needed a second post, so here we are.
